package.name: WebVision_CustomerRegistrationNotification
package.summary: Get a notification email of every new customer registration, including a customizable email template.
package.description:
Customer Registration Notification by web-vision

After a customer has registered in your Magento Shop you will receive an email including all given customer address data. Also the company will be available in the email.

The email address and the sender name can be configured from the Magento System setting.

Support for transactional email templates

The email template includes all fields that are currently available in the email.
package.notes: * Added configuration option which allows to use the email of the registered customer to be used as the sender of the email
